title: Nate Silver On Missed UK Forecasts: We Flubbed The Margin Of Error
teaser: Data guru Nate Silver of FiveThirtyEight.com tells NPR's Scott Simon how all the forecasts, including his own, were so far off in predicting the results of this week's British election.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
